pages.text: A variant of the $(l:contraptions/age1_andesite/mechanical_bearing)Mechanical Bearing$(), this machine is designed to generate power from rotation Put Wool or $(l:generators/age1_andesite/sail)Sails$() on it and set it going. A $(l:wrench)Wrench#() can change the direction it spins. Rotation, what a breeze!
